title: How to Make Furniture Polish Using Olive Oil

steps.title: Choose cheap olive oil for furniture polish.
steps.content: Choose cheap olive oil for furniture polish. The cheapest oil, olive pomace oil, is just fine for the purposes of making furniture polish.
